select la.*, ua.user_name, ua.user_logo from user_account ua left join launchpad la on la.user_id=ua.id where ua.is_del=0 and la.is_del=0
and ua.id = #{id}
and #{userName} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and ua.show_first_page=1
and la.collection_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectionName},'%')
and la.contract_address=#{contractAddress}
order by ua.sort_num desc
